website_summaries.verdict: It's a portable chair that also saves space and is sturdy.
pros: The tray fits in the dishwasher, and the unit cleans easily
cons: The chair angles steeply back, and the baby slouches while eating
Does not strap over the shoulders

customer_reviews.title: My son and I are both happy with this chair.
customer_reviews.text: Being this is only going to be used for a brief time, I couldn't justify spending a lot and this is better than I expected. I waited till my son could sit up on his own before getting this,I'd suggest the same. He's 6 months old now and will have plenty of time with this before he out grows it. Easy assembly ... 4 screws to attach the 4 stabilizers to the corners of the bottom legs.
customer_reviews.author: My D 1

customer_reviews.title: Just don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Word of advice: DONT BUY!! I'm writing this review because I wished I would of read this! It very reclined and the baby can not sit properly at the highchair. I tried propping a towel under her and behind her back but it just never worked and she looked so uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ERyser

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get your baby this chair if you can do better!
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday so baby only sat in it once to test it. I really don’t like it much! The material is very cheap! Cheap & sickly type material causing the baby to slide down is chair (baby is a supported sitter). Maybe sitter babies can overcome the slides!🙄 I might return it or use something else to cover the cheap looking seat! The manufacture could have used a better material!! Update: I returned this chair & got a much nicer one elsewhere! (Wow when it purchased it I paid $32 for it now Amazon increases the price to $55🤣 So not worth it!!🙄)
customer_reviews.author: Taiepg

customer_reviews.title: Its an unstable piece of scrap metal with a non removable seat.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. It's a pain to start taking apart after the toddler pees whilst sitting in it eating a red popsicle. To get all the way through all 8 screws that need to be removed to let you believe you actually will remove the padded fabric seat. Just to find a tension toggle attached to the bottom of the seat frame😑. What a stupid design for a childs highchair. Whowver designed this should he fired and forced to watch the children of his former coworkers to hopefully one day understand the value of a decent design of a childs chair and actually be able to clean it. It's a good thing it was cheap, its going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: jaimi

customer_reviews.title: Seat cover is not machine washable and not meant to be removed!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable Hugh chair but if you’re wanting to machine wash your seat cover stop and don’t purchase, there is a board inside cover and can’t be machine washed only hand wiped. This was a no go for me, really needed that extra high chair but ended up in the garage in pieces and us using another high chair that straps to the chair that is small enough to transport.
customer_reviews.author: ScifiChik

customer_reviews.title: This has been an excellent compact high chair
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent compact high chair. Although it is cheaper it is well made. The only thing that I did not find helpful was that it does not come with a shoulder belt. There is only a lap belt. In saying this if you are sitting with your child at all times feeding them it should never be an issue. If you intend on walking away even for a moment you're going to want to think twice. For an older child it's not so much of a problem and it is giving us no trouble at all since we are always right there during the feeding process. Well made though and we are happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rock747

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Just a simple cute highchair that doesn't take up a lot of room, and stores away. The fact that it stands up by itself when folded is also really nice. The tray is a nice large size, with a large cupholder for bulky sippy cups. Tray slides off easily for washing. There is a slight recline to the chair, but not bad at all. My daughter can still sit up and reach all corners of the tray easily. It's nice that she can relax a bit when she starts to get full. Also easy assembly, just screw on the 4 corners for the legs and snap on the footrest and tray.
customer_reviews.author: Afromerica

customer_reviews.title: Really good chair for the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy this because of the reviews about how the back leans too much. I'm glad I didn't listen to the negative reviews. This is a really good high chair for the price. It does lean back but my 6 month old has no trouble sitting up in this chair. As for those who said their baby fell out, I don't see how. It has a belt that goes around the waist and between the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Please think twice
customer_reviews.text: Please think twice. While the price is very good, product has serious drawbacks like the following: lack of support in the seat causes a sit-up-straight baby to slide down and slump. Very easy to bruise baby's thighs against tray when removing her from chair. In addition, the chair legs are at an angle that begs adults to stub toes when tending to baby. Tiny elephant design is noisy to the point of being obnoxious. But it is workable, and better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: auntie becca

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if it's a back up/ travel high chair
customer_reviews.text: Update- I have had zero issues with this high chair (besides the permanent recline) until today. Ive had this highchair for about 8 months now, and today was the day my kid had the worst blow out to date in the high chair. There is no amount of baby wipes I could use to get it out. Theres no way to remove th fabric to wash it either. I would not recommend this high chair, unless it's a back up/ travel high chair. It is very compact and easy to fold. My only complaint is that the back isnt straight up and down, and my little guy slouches because of it. Other than that, it's a great high chair
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Impractical High Chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this high chair for my 18 month old daughter. This high chair was very easy to put together and folds up very small, which I absolutely love because the high chair we have now is a beast. I ended up unfortunately returning this high chair after I realized (I didn't read the description well before purchasing....) that the fabric seat cover can't be removed. It is bolted to the high chair, which means this fabric can only be wiped, not machine washed. This is a deal breaker for our family, since our daughter is very messy. My mom has this high chair for her and reports that it is easy to clean, but still decided to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my baby’s legs several times
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but middle plastic part and metal part that in middle makes baby very unconfortable. And we cant use it al everytime we try to put baby in she stars crying like something hurts her very bad. Once plastic part cut her knee and she didnt stop crying and turned blue from pain. We stopped using it after that. Very dangerous from experience we had. I would not put my baby there anymore. Very bad product and not comfy And one more thing its small
customer_reviews.author: bastas

customer_reviews.title: It is not a good high chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grand children. It is not a good high chair. The seat is designed with no support and the babies slouch while in the chair. I have tried placing a pillow behind their backs and it doesn’t help. I would not buy it again. Now I need to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I fell for a sale because I wanted a new chair that was pink for my daughter. And I guess it was worth it while it lasted. There was much difficulty with cleaning the cloth. It's not a removable cover. Still very strong and sturdy, again while it lasted. I received it in March or April and it was in the trash by September. A seam split the length of the bottom seat and since the fabric is the seat it was not holding her weight. Wipe clean instantly. Decent for a affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great price, but hard for kids to sit up straight
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for the price. I bought one for myself at my house and one for my mother in laws. It’s is brainless to set it up (took seconds , literally) and very easy to clean. My only complaint is that is seems like my son is always slouching in it and it is very hard for him to sit up totally straight without slipping. The back isn’t adjustable and he’s always strapped in, yet he always slouches back. My mother in law has said the same thing. On my second child and him being almost a year, it gets the job done and the price is right
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great little high chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this (as grandparents) to have one handy when we have grandkids are over. Works great. Fold mechanism is easy and straightforward. Simple elegant design - not trying too hard to be more than it is. I'm not sure any high-chair is "easy to clean" (kids are devious little monsters that kids food debris into every nook and cranny - really). But the materials seems durable and scrubable. Has a decent footprint (not going to easily fall over (even if the kid happens to get a foot on the table edge - it's sturdy and stable).
customer_reviews.author: MC501

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Traveling & Quick Visits!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much! I was surprised!! It's so nice better than I thought it would be! This is perfect for traveling and can be folded down and put into a closet for the next time the little ones visit! My grandson loved it! It was easy to unfold and needed to snap lock the foot tray in place. It comes with 4 screws for the 4 corners that will keep the chair from scratching the floor. The tray can be removed and easily cleaned. It has seat straps to keep babies in place. It's not for children and babies over 50 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Thumbs-Up!!

customer_reviews.title: It’s not for us.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this high chair at all because the back of the seat is reclined and has not position adjusters. As a result my baby constantly slides forward in a slouching position and I have to re-adjust him a lot during feeding. As a result of the slouching the tray will leave red marks on his stomach. The tray itself needs both hands to press release buttons to get tray removed and back on the chair. If you have a fussy baby in your arms it’s impossible to pull the tray out one handed.
customer_reviews.author: Arty

customer_reviews.title: Decent High Chair for Older Babies
customer_reviews.text: I really like this high chair for the most part. I can easily clean it other than the buckles and straps to hold baby in. Those are always a pain to clean in any high chair. It's surprisingly sturdy for a chair that is so inexpensive. The only thing I am not crazy about is how my baby slouches in it. It has no recline feature or shoulder straps to keep him in place, so even when I buckle him in, by the end of the meal, he's just slouched or falling over or sliding down. I've tried putting something behind him to remedy this, but he still slumps over.
customer_reviews.author: Eileenlk

customer_reviews.title: Affordable chair
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a high chair that wasn't expensive but not so bulky or that would take up too much space. I was pretty surprised at how easy it is to fold and how compacted it is once folded. The only issues I had with this product was how the small screws for the feet of the chair weren't easy to screw in and the fact that the seat leans back a bit much. My son (who was 10 months when we bought this) always slouched into the chair because it caused him to lean back so much. I wouldn't recommend it for younger children, at least without support.
customer_reviews.author: JayBird

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable beginner high chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple high chair that is cost effective and does the job well. It is lightweight yet reasonably stable, comes with a tray and straps to hold baby in place. The fabric is of good quality and easy to wash, however you cannot remove the fabric separately and wash it. That’s one pain point. For younger babies the backrest is not very comfortable, you need to support it with a towel or something. Once the baby grows, it quickly becomes uncomfortable to sit in. Overall we used this high chair a lot and served us well. Ymmv.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Lover

customer_reviews.title: Well built compact high chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high chair for grandparents or other family members. It fold easily into a compact unit that stands on its own. It’s not really a high chair for every day use as the tray is too small to fit a lot of plates. The high chair is well built though and designed not to tip over. It’s designed to be light weight and is somewhat smaller than most high hairs meant for daily use, but this one is great if you want a compact traveling high chair and/or one for a second home or grandparents’ house.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Best value for a high chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this high chair as a spare for Grandma's house when we visit and wish I had bought one for my own house instead of the much more expensive wooden high chair that I have. This one is so easy to clean and it doesn't take up so much space, plus you can fold it and put it away when not in use! It is very easy to put together, and the cover comes off easily to toss in the washer, and has so far held up very well after maybe 5 washes. Would definitely buy again, actually considering getting another for my home now!
customer_reviews.author: Tara H.

customer_reviews.title: Small and hard to maneuver child in and out
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is small and short! It is hard to put a one year old in because there is a metal bar that goes across above their legs. So you have to bend the child like a pretzel to get their legs through. The tray is not easy to put on and off either. Not impressed with anything more that it fold easy and will fit in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: momtee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR GRANDMA's House!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, light weight, not too big, easy to assemble, easy to clean, just what I needed for Grandma and Grandpa's house! It will be easy to store between grandbabies. The tray does take two hands to put on and take off which is not a problem when there are several adults around to assist with baby and tray. It may be more difficult managing baby and tray solo. It is for independent sitters since the back does not adjust; however, for what we need it for, it is PERFECT especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stavia

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 for my twin granddaughters. One of my other granddaughters has one & they brought it over for me to use while I was watching her. I loved how compact it was. It was also easy to open up & & close back down. The "hardest" part of assembly was aligning the screws. But it really wasn't that much of a challenge. I have a very small apartment so that was another big plus, its compact size!! I would definitely recommend this product, especially if you have a small living space!
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Seat will crumble
customer_reviews.text: We love this high chair and our 3 year old (who is really the size of a 4 year old) thinks it's his chair. For safety we aren't ready to hook him into a booster. He likes to sit in this to eat, play games, watch videos and interact with the teaching lessons on the ipad. But...you CANNOT wash the seat as the cardboard will totally crumble. Kids, food, diapers...you get it it needs to be cleaned. So, after having to deal with a crumbling seat we added some books underneath. I'm sure it's not the most comfortable seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Hughes

customer_reviews.title: can't clean this, buy something else
customer_reviews.text: we didn't check if it can be taken apart to be cleaned because you would assume something like this should be able to do that. this seat is not designed to be cleaned. the fabric is not only bolted onto the chair(can be removed) but the bottom part has hardened cardboard integrated in it (like baseball caps), so you can't really wash it with water properly. and babies will make mess, not worth buying this 1 time use garbage. learn from my mistake
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: My son is already pretty big and I love these Cosco chairs since they fold completely and can be put away. This is my second one, and the only difference with this one is that it has the pop off mini tray for easier cleaning of messes. For me personally I prefer without it because it’s so freaking hard to pop off! And once I finally manage to get it off all the food goes flying! I’m not sure if I’m doing something wrong, but the mini tray is super annoying. Other than that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Perfect size and folds up easily which is great for bringing it along to holiday dinners. The back is tilted back which may be a problem for some people but my little one doesn’t seem to mind. She sits on her own and sometimes lays back for a rest. The cover does not come off but it’s very easy to wipe down with a wet cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great chair with only one downfall....
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this chair! First of all it’s super affordable and comes basically all put together already wilhoch was great! The colors are so cute and it folds up so small which is awesome for us!! The ONLY downfall I have found is that it reclines too much and there is no way to sit it up more... my 2 year old can sit in it fine but my one year old always ends up slouching down too much and he gets fussy... other than that I am very happen with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Greer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap AND Cheaply Designed
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Affordable, cute, easy to clean Cons- terrible design 1. The seat leans WAY back 2. The legs stick out at an odd angle 3. It doesn't have wheels to roll and it scrapes the floor when it's moved. Our biggest complaint is the seat - our one year old can't even sit up straight in this chair even with blankets placed behind her. I would not recommend buying this highchair. We gave this one to her grandparents and purchased a better (yet more experience) high chair that she can actually be comfortable in.
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion- DD

customer_reviews.title: Great for saving space
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these. 1 for my house, 1 for my mothers, and one for my grandmothers. My sister even has one for her daughter now... my only issue is that you cant take off the fabric to clean it. My son gets way messier food at home. So cleaning the seat, is a nightmare only because it wont be dry by the next meal.... otherwise these are great high chairs. They fold down to practically nothing. Easy to load into your car and bring anywhere if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Michael leach

customer_reviews.title: Using as a backup, but would be fine as an only!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to bring to our vacation home instead of treking the 200$ seat we have at home back and forth. I was looking for something cheap, but didn't want to compromise on safety and I am SO happy I found this. Took me 5 minutes to put the leg bases on. Standard phillips screwdriver only. Simple!! Light weight and pull button close. Weighs less than our car seat. Our 6 month old can sit up on her own, so it works great for us. Has plenty of room for baby to grow. Feels both safe and sturdy... For 30$! Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So much value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this high chair, as I was not interested in spending upwards of $50 on a high chair, not knowing, if our family will actually adopt it and if our infant will use a high chair. I have seen a couple of friends who have high-chairs that are never used, but there, as a bad investment Our son is now over two years old (30 lbs), and can climb on the chair, and though it looks flimsy, we have never seen it topple with a 30lb toddler trying to climb using no additional assistance This is an investment worth making for your child, and the design and quality are both above par
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grandma's house
customer_reviews.text: We now have two of these at grandma's house, and the low price point and easy compact fold-up are important features since they see only occasional use. However, I don't see any reason why this wouldn't hold up to every day use. I MUCH prefer these to the graco models that take up way too much space and have an excessive amount of fabric in which to lose crumbs. The harness system is also much easier to use than the graco fasteners, which are impossible with an uncooperative baby. I can't speak to how well these work for a full range of ages, but were perfect for our experience to date: toddlers 20-35 lb.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: For the simple and on  the budget parent- it does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: On the budget parent- it does it’s job. It’s a simple chair. If you need something just to be able to feed your kid and be done this is it. If you are looking for luxury cover removal options, extra comfort this isn’t for you. This is a basic chair the material used can be wiped clean even though you can’t remove it. As your child gets older they might be active a lot and This chair only has waist straps to hold child and not like a car seat where you can tie them at the top and bottom. But let the kid play it’s ok. It does the job absolutely. Super easy assemble, super light to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and compact. Light
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and folds. Only complaint is that the back sits back at an angle and the child doesn’t sit straight up in the seat. I use a travel pillow behind them so they are laying back too far to eat. If there Is an adjustment for that, I haven’t found it yet. Easy to clean and compact
customer_reviews.author: michelle long

customer_reviews.title: Good for short term, but not long term!
customer_reviews.text: I got this high chair because it was cheap and would work well for my 6 mos old niece that was visiting for the month. It functioned well as a high chair, but I wouldn't recommend for full time use. Buckled in, she kept sliding down because the back of the chair sloped at an angle so she couldn't sit upright, she's at the stage where she can sit upright pretty well. It was nice because it folded down (not very easily though) out of the way. Overall, good for short term use, but not a permanent solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sarafina

customer_reviews.title: The product description is false: fabric cannot be removed. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This high chair works well...until it's time to clean it. There is a chart in the description that claims this high chair has a removable cover. This is a bold-faced lie. The "removable" fabric is screwed directly into the frame of the chair with 8 screws. Even if you unscrew them, there is a piece of particle board sewn into the frame (which serves as a base for your baby to sit on). It can't be removed without tearing the fabric. This product description is intentionally misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Not machine washable!!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! The high chair material is not removable so you will not be able to give it a proper cleaning like in your clothes washing machine. To remove the material you will have to remove six screws and drill out at least two rivers then replace them with screws. (Be sure to get screws that will not cut your child!!). Then you will also have to cut open the seat to remove the particle board seat. Then after washing you will have to repair the cut you made to remove the particle board seat! THIS IS VERY POORLY DESIGNED.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Very Compact but doesn’t provide much back support.
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair for its compactness BUT I hate it also because it doesn’t provide very much back support! My almost 2 year old slumps in the chair a lot. I bought this chair when he was nearly 1 and I had the same issue back then. Fast forward to nearly a year later I was compelled to write this review bc occasionally he slumps in it and I have to pull him up. I am able to store this chair under our kitchen table which I love so it does have it’s pro and con!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Where are all these positive reviews coming from??? This thing is useless with the absurd slant backwards. Even buckled, baby just slides back so he’s practically lying down trying to eat. We are constantly sitting him upright and stuffing blankets behind him so he can sit up. You get what you pay for with this one! *My little guy sits well on the floor and has for many months so it’s not due to his lack of ability to sit upright.
customer_reviews.author: AL. B.

customer_reviews.title: Dont like it!
customer_reviews.text: I had high Hope's for this chair !... I do like the fact that you can fold it up and store it. Also the tray comes off so you can wash it. Nice and affordable. Now the cons, you can't remove the padding from it witch is gross !! If you've got a messy eater. My baby is 16 months and she looks soo u uncomfortable in it , its reclined a little to back and you cant adjust that! Shes always sliding down from it . The seat is also hard , seems like just a piece of cardboard with a cover over it I'd say spend the extra money and get a good one !!
customer_reviews.author: GeeFamily

customer_reviews.title: So gross
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand why the fabric is screwed into the chair instead of snapped. I feel like that would have made cleaning it a million times easier. My baby has only used this for a month and I’m already looking for a more sanitary option now that he’s self feeding. Also it’s very light and wobbly. If you have other kids or even a rowdy dog running around, I wouldn’t trust the high chair to not topple over if bumped.
customer_reviews.author: alaura

customer_reviews.title: For the price you can't do better!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Super easy to fold and shove in a tiny out of the way space. The seat is a very wipable material and while the cover doesn't remove easily - it does remove if you really want to machine wash it. I just wipe it down with a rag after each meal and it's been fine! Kiddo does seem to slouch weirdly in it (he's 13 months), but could just be him being silly! Doesn't bother us, I just adjust him if he slouches. I think this thing is a heck of a deal for $40
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, folds up small
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to wipe down, and it folds up small. Those are the most important things to me. The fabric does not remove. I’ve had it for about 4 years now, and I have taken it outside and completely hosed it down a couple of times just to get it really clean as necessary. Then it dries out and is ready to go again. The only issue is when your baby is very small, not sitting up great, they have a tendency to slip down in the seat and have to constantly adjust their position. This only lasts for a short time, though,and soon they are able to sit up all on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Megan H.

customer_reviews.title: If only it reckoned just a little bit less!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It's a real high chair that folds up to a great size so it can easily be stored. We got it to have at our house for my granddaughter and it's so convenient. We love being able to pack it away when she's not here and that we don't lose a chair when she uses it. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the seat back reclines more than I'd like, wish she could sit up straighter in it and have the back support.
customer_reviews.author: Clem

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair I love it. You can adjust the tray in and out for different size however you cannot adjust the angle and i feel like he likes this better than the all wood old fashion. With that said he likes it better but will not sit up right like he was forced to with the wood. This is more forgiving fabric back and will let kid slump. I am dealing with it but I feel like he takes eating less serious? if that makes sense. I wish i could rotate in forward just a click but its not adjustable in this way. For the price its pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great Highchair!
customer_reviews.text: Love the easiness of folding and unfolding of this highchair. The colors are real to photo and it looks great! It is easy to clean and store. The only slight downside to this chair is that the fabric back on the chair does allow a little bit of give and baby can slouch a little. This didn't bother us too much, we just tucked a hand towel behind to prop the baby's back so that the baby didn't slouch.
customer_reviews.author: KnockKnock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect High Chair
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easily cleans, sturdy, portable to Grandmas house and easily folds for storage. I love this high chair I bought for my Grandson. The tray is easy to clean as well, the pattern is cheery too. He is quick to get into the high chair because he loves to eat breakfast lunch and dinner and dessert when his plate is clean. My Grandson has enjoyed the chair and I enjoy having him in one safe place for 30 minutes at a time getting good nutrition. I would buy another in a heart beat should I be blessed with another baby in our lives. I highly recommend this High Chair.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's lightweight, yet feels sturdy enough for baby. Especially like that I dont have to use the tray and can pull him right up to the table. Only thing that I would change is to make the cloth part so it would come off to wash, but so far we've been able to sweep off crumbs & wipe it down with no issue. Folds down sooo easily so I can put it away to clean floor or just keep it out of the way as we tend to stub our toes on it's wide stance. Overall, great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold/store BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased that this high chair was immediately easy to simply unfold and use. That said, the sitting position is in a slightly "reclining" & that slides my 8 month old granddaughter forward into a less-than upright "sitting position." She's sitting very well now, but I'm thinking of getting some kind of cushion to keep her from sliding forward. I DO use it, but if I found a high chair that was easy to store and help her upright, I'd go to that. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carol

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting baby poo magnet
customer_reviews.text: ETA 18 months out: a horribly designed product that is completely unsanitary. You can't remove the cover to wash, so the first poop or pee just gets ground into the fabric as you try to wipe it away. So gross!!! We are being forced to throw this chair away because after trying to wash it with a hose, the sewn in plywood dissolved leaving no seat. Great idea for a folding high chair but incredibly poor execution. One of the best baby items we have purchased. It is amazing because it is so light and folds down so small. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: I love this highchair for this price
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair for this price!! Easy to clean, easy to put together and love the colors. For those that complained of it not be enough cushion for their child, it is fine.I do not leave my daughter in it for long periods. She eats and gets out of her highchair. These are not made to sit in all day. :) Love mine :) Great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the baby Houdini from escaping
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for its weight, it’s foldability, and the comfort level that my grandson seems to enjoy. The clips are very strong, which is great because on his last high chair, he was able to unclip the belt and try to escape. We hang it in our pantry on two carabiners when not in use. I could see us taking this with us to restaurants because it is so lightweight and is practically flat when folded. Highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Christi H

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Has that mayterial that caan be wiped off easily can fold easily (once I figured it out 😂) traytray has three different positions it can lock into. And can be washed in dishwasher easy to put back on. The only problem I had was the bottom pieces of the legs to keep it Saturday was a pain in the butt to put in trying to line up the screws ( make sure to check that they are secured before using. One of them kept falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I like that it folds and is easy to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a secondary highchair for when my grandchildren are here for meals. I like that I can fold it to store away. It does lean back like the other reviewers said. My grandson is 12 months and he managed to sit upright, but he definitely leaned back (please use safety straps). The seat wipes clean, but doesn't remove for washing. Easy to assemble, just added the feet. Watched the video to figure out how to fold it though. Overall happy with purchase for the minimal use it will get and space it takes to store. The order shipped on time.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand, Quality Products
customer_reviews.text: I like Cosco brand highchairs. They’re easy to put together, store, transport and inexpensive. My 2 year old great niece has one as well as my 5 month old great nephew (this was purchased for him) now. Their mother loves this brand because of all the same reasons I do. That's why when she needed one for her son, I purchased the same brand she had already for her daughter as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Clairese

customer_reviews.title: Best 40 dollars I've spent in a while
customer_reviews.text: I got this chair for my 2yr old son. He's about 36lbs so when I saw the 50lb weight limit I was sold. That and the fact it folds up in way that makes it easy to travel with. Its not as bulky as most highchairs you see in stores. Idk about anyone else but this chair cover IS REMOVABLE. But it looks like you spot clean it. Its not meant for a washing machine. This is day one but I absolutely love it and so does my son.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great basic chair, affordable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This high chair was a bargain, and arrived just as pictured. The tray can be a little bit of a struggle to line up when attaching it to the chair, but otherwise it's a joy to use. The surfaces are easy to clean and the fabric wipes clean when needed. It is lightweight and comes with a straps for extra security. It doesn't recline or have shoulder straps (5-point harness), but we started feeding solids when my baby was 6 months old so she could sit up very well on her own and was fine in this chair. Appears to be good quality for everyday use. Feels very stable and secure.
customer_reviews.author: ordinarygirl

customer_reviews.title: For a $30 chair this is fantastic. Here is why
customer_reviews.text: For a $30 chair this is fantastic. Here is why: a) It comes with a tray b) It folds and is compact c) Its a highchair Here are the negatives: a) The back part of the chair is reclined and cant be adjusted (I just use a small pillow behind babys back to fix the problem) b) You cant remove the lining on highchair Its still a great buy for the price. If your looking for a more durable long lasting highchair expect to look elsewhere and pay more. I use this particular highchair to travel or at grandmas for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: jesse baum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold and put away.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these to have on hand for when our grandchildren visit. These fold up easily and do not take up a lot of space. These are not for children who can not sit up on their own. Cleans up easily for children who are eating regular food but I’m not sure how well it would clean with regular runny baby food. Very happy with purchase and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent high hair
customer_reviews.text: I do love the colors and look of this high chair, it’s very nice looking. My only real issue is how small it is. I was looking for a smaller, more compact high chair than my previous one, which this is. It is just way shorter than expected. The highest it goes is much shorter than I was expecting. It also does not really recline the way I’m used to with previous high chairs, so my little one kind of slumps over in it. Hoping we get used to it, it does look nice and cleans very well.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair for the price. This is my second one. I use them for my Airbnbs and I love that they fold down in half. They fit in the back of the pantry when not in use. Very easy to operate. The only negative thing I can think to say is that the seat and back are covered in fabric that does not come off. It is stain resistant but a little harder to clean then I might like. Overall a great high chair
customer_reviews.author: laney

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.  Buy it now.  You will not regret it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best high chair on the market. I have 5 children and needed to find something that was quick, easy to use and folded up for storage. This does all those things and more. Tray comes off for easy cleaning, was practically put together already just had to screw in the foot holders and ta da. Done. Ready for baby. Seriously. Got rid of my Ikea high chair and the one that hooks onto the counter and the one that hooks onto a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Cons The seat does not remove to wash. The back of the chair leans too far back. Foot rest does not adjust. Seat straps don't extend long enough for larger children. Pros Takes up very little space when folded. Easy to store. Stands up on it's own when folded. Quality for the price is a deal. Tray removes for easy wash. Material is easy to wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any parent I totally love this high chair
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this high chair, not only did it arrive several day's early but it pretty much comes assembled all you have to do is screw on the four things to balance out and snap on the food tray and there you go. Not to mention that it came at an awesome price. Plus it conveniently folds up so small I could fit it in between my icebox and dresser area perfect for a small house.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Duque

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair, terrible to clean
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this high chair.. It's a cute design and is the right height for my table. I don't like that it is difficult to get clean. I would much prefer a full plastic seat that can be wiped down or a fabric cover that can be thrown in the washer. The cover appears to be able to slip off, but it is not. I am looking to replace this high chair with one that is a low maintenance, especially now that my toddler is not a neat eater.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Safe & Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It came packaged and all you have to do is slip on the foot rest and screw on the 4 feet (1 screw each). Not sure why they sent a 5th foot??? The 3-pt safety strap is sturdy and adjustable. The only negative is that the back of the seat leans backward an angle so I have to put a folded towel behind an 8-month old so she can sit up straight.
customer_reviews.author: 'boro Gram

customer_reviews.title: This seat covering cannot be removed to wash
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair for the price. However, it's a baby chair and you can't remove the cover to wash it unless you totally disassemble the entire chair. How crazy is that? My granddaughter had her 1st birthday party here yesterday. She had 2 smash cakes that were pretty much smashed all over the chair covering. The only way to clean it is by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Awful high chair
customer_reviews.text: This high chair us uncomfortable, it makes my DS slouch in a manner that hinders his eating. If the tray is all the way in, it forces his hips forward, so he has to strain to lean forward in order to eat, but the other setting gives him too much room, so food gets everywhere. The straps dig in, there are tiny fissures in the plastic that get filled with food. The strap is hard to clean. For a high chair company that has been around since the early 19th century, they sure have a sub par product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pay for what you get...
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent high chair for the price. The back doesn't adjust so make sure the child can sit up on its own pretty well. We put a pillow in the back to give more support. The cover doesn't come off to clean but me and my mom are looking at taking it off. Also it was a pain at first to fold up. Mine didn't come with a paper of anything so after you tubing we figured it out. Its nice that it folds up.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be washed! Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I hate this high chair. Only buy if you’re certain your child will never get it so dirty it needs a wash, the cover is sewn around the bars and screwed on. How STUPID is that?! Also as your baby gets heavier they can easily tip it around. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy for when my Great nephew comes to visit
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for when my Great nephew comes to visit. I would give it 5 stars except for the fact that the back has just enough slant that he slips down, he cant slip out because of the guard in between his legs but other than that it is lightweight, easy to just fold open and closed. The double snap out tray is great.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Reclines too far back
customer_reviews.text: This is the high chair I keep at my parent’s house. Thank goodness it is not my primary highchair. It folds away nicely when I’m not visiting. However, the baby is reclined so far back that I have to put a pillow behind her every time. It is obviously not comfortable. I’ve seen it said already, but it’s true, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gille

customer_reviews.title: It's a pain to clean
customer_reviews.text: It works well as a high chair and folds up nicely. The only downside is to clean the seat you have to entirely dissemble the chair (not easy) and even then you can't throw it in the laundry due to the sewn in particleboard base. So you have to clean it in place which never gets it fully clean. Pros: Folds small Durable Cons: A pain to clean
customer_reviews.author: Country Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Good seat to start solid food
customer_reviews.text: Omg so cute amd fun design. Its so flexible and easy to fold and store away so skinny when u fold it away. Perfect hight. Very tall but perfect to feed from couch even. Very sturdy and strong feel. Very cushioned seat and back rest. Wasy to remove tray and wash. Material on seat seems easy to wash too. Has a cup or bottle holder its awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Garcia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for minimal use!
customer_reviews.text: This highchair is SO CONVENIENT!!! I love how EASILY it assembles/disassembles. It’s lightweight too! The only downsides are 1)You cannot adjust the position of the highchair - baby slides to a slouching position very easily! 2)A few areas are difficult to clean because food gets stuck in them (hard to get to..small spaces) Overall, my experience with this portable highchair has been GREAT for use every now and then and not everyday :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Krajewski

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: This high chair is at Grandmas house so used infrequently as grand baby lives 3 hours away. It works well because it folds and can be easily stored when not in use. It is lightweight and easy to take along. The price is awesome. The cons are the seat cover is NOT removable for deep cleaning and the tray can be finicky when you are putting it on. Requires 2 hands. It works well at Grandmas house but the exact same type didn't last long with everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Easily cleans with warm water & soap. Has a nice adjustable safety strap. And tray has several adjustment. Good for children who aren’t fully sitting up straight in the own. Because it has a bit of a recline position for the babies back. Not adjustable just a slightly reclined back. Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KC23

customer_reviews.title: Great product, be aware of tray size before purchase
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed how easy it was to put together, and it is foldable which is nice. It isn’t the sturdiest thing but for the price I am pleased with the product. The only thing I wish I had known before purchase though is the tray seems a little smaller in person. If you are wanting them to eat directly from the tray without a plate then it is fine. However, my daughter eats from a plate and it’s so small it seems like it’s going to frequently get pushed off on accident. Overall I would purchase it again, it just really depends on your needs if this is a good fit for you!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Gibler

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a cheap high chair but it serves it's purpose for grandma's house. My graco one is much better quality. I dont like how the seat leans back a little and only has a lap belt. If you can afford it I'd get a more expensive brand for everyday use, but for grandma's house once every couple months it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Local

customer_reviews.title: quick and easy cleanup! love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this high chair. Its stylish, great quality and I love how easy it is to store. Its very easy to clean up. Theres not a lot of nooks and crannies where crumbs can hide and the tray has a liner that makes meal time so much easier. My only issue is this high chair is only meant for babies who can sit up on their own. I would by again!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Better High Chair Options
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a nicely constructed, well-made high chair, I'm returning it because the back of the high chair won't support my five month old granddaughter's back. She's unable to sit up straight without additional back support. It is better suited for older babies and toddlers. The price point and attractive cover are commendable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better safety belt.
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact it is, I fit 4 in my broom closet. I have a daycare. I MUST say though, it NEEDS a 5pt harness for that one kid that can stand up out of the seatbelt and try to kill herself by climbing down while you've stepped away to refill another child's cup of milk. If it had the 5pt harness I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My baby fall down, not safe for babys under 1 year old.
customer_reviews.text: This hair chair is not good for babys under 1 year old. My 10 months old baby had fallen down from it. The belt is very thin and doesn't support the baby. I will never use it again due this. I never recommend it. Very dangerous and I never can leave the baby alone on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price and convenience!
customer_reviews.text: Great highchair especially to be able to hide it away! We have two under 2 and it’s so nice to be able to fold one away when needed. Only thing I wasn’t super happy with was that I felt they slide I little in the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ccarol80

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re on the fence about this high chair just get it! I have a total Buddha baby he is tall and big and most hair chairs have a weight limit that would make them useless for my baby in about a month and he’s only 1! This one has a higher weight limit and that makes a world of difference. It’s so easy to fold and super light so you can take it anywhere. I really love this and recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Highchair
customer_reviews.text: Currently using this as a second high chair for my son for when we visit family/ friends. Honesty like it even more than the ZOE one we have at home for every day use. It folds up super easy, everything is easy to clean, it's not heavy at all, and it was extremely easy to assemble. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DenverDad

customer_reviews.title: Cosco black arrow high chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this high chair because the color and it had a tray insert. The tray insert is the most difficult thing to get off though and it's a pain. The chair is compact and not very tall, but would be really easy to pack up and take places. I wish it had safety straps for the chest (only has a waist strap), but overall it does the job and I'm pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Folds easily, tray needs two hands
customer_reviews.text: The tray requires two hands to take on and off. Which is annoying when you ALWAYS have a baby you’re trying to sit in it. It folds up and sits beside our refrigerator. The main selling point for me is that it folds as we have a small apartment, it’s great if you need to store it out of the way. I took off the cover and washed it once in the past 2 months, colors did not fade, all stains came out easily and reapplying the cover was fairly simple after a quick YouTube tutorial.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: easy to fold up and unfold
customer_reviews.text: Con's- The "recline" is not adjustable and causes the child to "slouch" because of it's positioning. We have to put a bunched up towel behind her back so she isn't laying down while trying to eat. Also, the tray is very tricky to get on and off. You have to line it up just right and it's very frustrating at times. Other times it goes on without a problem. Pro's- lightweight, easy to fold up and unfold, portable (we use this one for when we are traveling to visit family), easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: doodlz81

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be cleaned properly.
customer_reviews.text: This was an expensive chair and easy to fold and take with to family holidays. However it can only be wiped down and over the course of several months has developed stains that cannot be cleaned. Spend a couple extra dollars for a cover that can be removed and thrown in the washer and properly sanitized.
customer_reviews.author: Audreypuppy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We love this high chair! It is very reasonably priced and easy to clean. We ordered it for an extra for the babysitters house. She also loves it. It is very easy to fold and put away so it doesn't constantly take up space in the kitchen. It is slim and light weight which makes it easy to move around as well.
customer_reviews.author: MLD

customer_reviews.title: It’s good, but a tad bit small
customer_reviews.text: I’m almost sure my daughter will outgrow this before her first birthday. My one complaint is the material on the chair is comfortable for my daughter but it’s slippery. It’s tough for her to stay sitting up and not slouching because her clothes and seat material don’t have any grip. Tray is easily adjusted or removed. Cleans easily. Assembly was a bit more than I expected but very easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Kids are safe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair mostly for one reason.... there is a wide plastic center piece between the baby's legs making it impossible for a child to slide through while feeding them :) At 10 months my granddaughter does kind of sink down a little, so I put a blanket behind her back, but never slides out!!
customer_reviews.author: ♥Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful high chair
customer_reviews.text: At first I did it want to order this because everyone complained you couldn't wash the cover. This high chair is amazing and the fabric is so easy to wipe down with soap and water. This is the easiest high chair I have cleaned and I've raised 4 kids. My favorite high chair by far. So easy to fold, compact, light, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great good quality highchair for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair. I needed three of them and these were very affordable. I was happy when I received them and they are easy to fold up. They are sturdy and good quality. The seat does lean back a little but not a problem. My little ones can sit up straight or lean back whichever they prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R. Gillen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, collapsible storable high chair
customer_reviews.text: Pros: came practically assembled. Easy to open and close, can fold and store instead of taking up space, lightweight can travel with if needed, cute design, easy to clean removable tray, very sturdy locks in place so chair won't collapse, tall enough to not Ben's over or crouch. Con: None I found for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe O'Connor

product_meta.title: Cosco Simple Fold High Chair with 3-Position Tray (Elephant Squares)
product_meta.description: Color:Elephant SquaresMake mealtimes at home or on-the-go with your baby easy and fun with the Cosco Elephant Squares Simple Fold High Chair with 3-Position Tray. Lightweight and stable, with a simple, no-nonsense design, this portable high chair quickly folds flat after mealtimes for storage out of sight or for packing easily into the car. A full-size tray with cup holder accommodates three positions to adjust the chair with your growing child. The high chair's wipeable seat pad makes cleanup quick and easy. Specially designed for travel, this high chair folds down quickly and easily for meals on the go. Sturdy, reinforced legs and a three-point safety harness keeps babies up to 50 pounds safe and secure in the high chair. A built-in leg rest keeps little feet comfortable. This high chair is JPMA-certified, meets ASTM standards for safety, and includes a one-year limited warranty. For more than 70 years, Cosco has been a leading children’s product brand recognized for its dedication to safety and value. From bouncers to car seats, swings to strollers, and high chairs to play yards, Cosco's essential baby products feature solid value and smart design. Care Instructions : Easy wipe seat makes all that baby goo simple to clean.
feature_bullets: Easy wipe seat makes all that baby goo simple to clean
Folds flat and stands on its own, making it easy to hide away
Compact fold great for taking on the go
No nonsense design sets up in just seconds
3 point harness keeps child up to 50 pounds secure

specifications.Care instructions: Easy wipe seat makes all that baby goo simple to clean
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars8,168 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
